Name: Sake Manhattan
Ingredients: 2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Lighter in style than your typical Manhattan cocktail , with all the familiar flavours enhanced by extra sake complexity.
History: Created in October 2016 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. See: Manhattan cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Sake Manhattan contains 172 calories
